channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Credentials Binding Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Credentials Binding Plugin

item.title: CVE-2020-2182|2024-08-04T07:01:40.977Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20credentials%20binding%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Credentials Binding Plugin 1.22 and earlier does not mask (i.e., replace with asterisks) secrets containing a `$` character in some circumstances.

item.title: CVE-2020-2181|2024-08-04T07:01:40.930Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20credentials%20binding%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Credentials Binding Plugin 1.22 and earlier does not mask (i.e., replace with asterisks) secrets in the build log when the build contains no build steps.
